name: Songbringer
description: Darkness sleeps just beneath the cracks on the ever-changing planet. The curious will uncover powerful artifacts and forge them anew. The strong will take the nanosword and crush galactic giants.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.0 Ghz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ Compatible Card Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card Storage: 4 GB available space
